title: Mid-Term Examinations Schedule Released
author: Registrar Office
content: The mid-term examination schedule for all departments has been published. Students are advised to check the notice board and prepare accordingly.

title: Library Extended Hours
author: Library Department
content: The library will be open until 10:00 PM starting next week to support exam preparation. WiFi and study spaces are available.

title: Fee Payment Deadline Extension
author: Finance Office
content: The fee payment deadline has been extended to January 31st, 2026. Students with pending balances should clear before the deadline to avoid penalties.

title: Career Fair 2026
author: Student Affairs
content: Annual career fair scheduled for February 15th. Leading companies will be recruiting. Update your CVs and attend preparation workshops.

title: Sports Day Registration
author: Sports Department
content: Inter-department sports day registration is now open. Register your team by January 25th. Events include football, volleyball, and athletics.
